alert.note: Alert for Todd (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 13 at 9:36AM CDT until May 16 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Long Prairie River at Long Prairie affecting Todd County. .Recent heavy rainfall has caused the Long Prairie River to rise to near flood stage this morning; it will reach minor Flood Stage late this morning and crest by late this weekend. For the Long Prairie River...including Long Prairie...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Long Prairie River at Long Prairie. * WHEN...From this morning to Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, 1st Avenue SW becomes innundated. Lumber yard and produce store parking lots flood due to water backing up Venewitz Creek. Lions Westside park impacted. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 815 AM CDT Friday, the stage was 6.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 7.4 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 7.3 feet on 03/28/2019. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
